When the ML three step procedure was applied, nonconvergence sometimes occured when the standard number of iterations (500) for the algorithm used by Latent Gold was used. 
This lead to inadmissable solutions. Therefore, we investigated at which iterations of the simulation this occured, and rerun these using 5000 iterations for the algorithm. 

There, you find an overview for which iterations this was needed at every condition. 



      ss c.prob z.coef    q.coef
1    200   0.70   0.01 0.5000000 for(s in c(5, 9, 10, 14, 39, 41, 44, 48, 57, 69, 70, 74, 96, 107, 113, 117, 127, 130, 139, 142, 146, 153, 157, 172, 182, 192, 193, 204, 206, 215, 224, 228, 231, 232, 237, 246, 249, 253, 283, 296, 298, 317, 323, 326, 331, 335, 338, 351, 364, 369, 372, 374, 375, 382, 397, 400, 401, 402, 415, 421, 424, 430, 434, 435, 444, 446, 455, 458, 460, 461, 464, 474, 476, 482, 489, 495, 497, 506, 507, 514, 539, 540, 550, 566, 567, 569, 581, 583, 585, 587, 589, 590, 596, 597, 609, 615, 617, 686, 694, 701, 708, 710, 715, 721, 722, 731, 732, 741, 744, 746, 761, 768, 779, 783, 784, 785, 786, 796, 800, 802, 803, 807, 815, 817, 825, 832, 838, 839, 851, 855, 858, 868, 881, 886, 889, 900, 908, 914, 938, 944, 959, 979, 992, 995, 997)){
2    500   0.70   0.01 0.5000000 for(s in c(26, 59, 212, 814, 880, 929)){
